expo.name: Wifey Dating App with Admin Dashboard

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: We need access to your camera to take photos and videos.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: We need access to your contacts to use contacts.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This app does not use your calendar.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: This app does not use your reminders.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: We need access to your microphone to record audio.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: We need access to your photo library to select photos and videos.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: We need access to your location to help you find your way.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: We need access to your photo library to save photos and videos.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: We need access to your location to help you find your way.
infoPlist.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: This app does not use your speech recognition.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsFullAccessUsageDescription: This app does not use your calendar.
infoPlist.NSRemindersFullAccessUsageDescription: This app does not use your reminders.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: We need access to your location to help you find your way.
